items.name: Start Titan Game Mode
items.description: [Focus: FPS] Closes common background apps and restarts Explorer after gaming (use Stop to revert).

items.name: Stop Titan Game Mode
items.description: [Focus: FPS] Restores desktop by restarting Explorer.

items.name: Game Mode: Open GPU stretch / scaling panel
items.description: [Focus: FPS] Detects your GPU vendor and opens NVIDIA Control Panel, AMD Radeon Software, or Windows Display settings so you can configure stretched resolution and scaling.
